verses.kjv: The LORD reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth between the cherubims; let the earth be moved.
verses.ct: The LORD rules as king — let the nations shake! He sits enthroned above the cherubim — let the earth tremble!

verses.kjv: The LORD is great in Zion; and he is high above all the people.
verses.ct: The LORD is mighty in Zion; he is exalted far above every nation.

verses.kjv: Let them praise thy great and terrible name; for it is holy.
verses.ct: Let them praise your great and awe-inspiring name — he is holy.

verses.kjv: The king’s strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.
verses.ct: The king in his power loves justice. You have established fairness; you have carried out justice and righteousness among the people of Jacob.

verses.kjv: Exalt ye the LORD our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.
verses.ct: Lift up the LORD our God and bow down at his footstool — he is holy.

verses.kjv: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.
verses.ct: Moses and Aaron served among his priests, and Samuel was among those who called on his name. They cried out to the LORD, and he responded to them.

verses.kjv: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance that he gave them.
verses.ct: He spoke to them from the pillar of cloud. They followed his commands and the laws he gave them.

verses.kjv: Thou answeredst them, O LORD our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.
verses.ct: You answered them, LORD our God. You were a God who forgave them, even though you punished them for their wrongdoing.

verses.kjv: Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God is holy.
verses.ct: Lift up the LORD our God and worship at his holy mountain, because the LORD our God is holy.
